welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Billerbeck, known for its quaint streets, historical buildings, and rich culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy our beautiful city during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Twente Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
